thread.title: ‘One of the most important discoveries ever’ was just made in Egypt
thread.title_full: ‘One of the most important discoveries ever’ was just made in Egypt

author: Alex
title: ‘One of the most important discoveries ever’ was just made in Egypt
text:
A massive 3,000-year-old statue was just uncovered in the slums of Egypt, and experts are calling it “one of the most important discoveries ever.” 2 
Archaeologists say the 26-foot colossus likely depicts Pharaoh Ramses II. 3 
The statue was found submerged in water where the city of Heliopolis once stood, which is located in modern day Cairo. 4 
The statue is made of quartzite and was found alongside a smaller statue depicting Pharaoh Seti II (Ramses’ son) and a large obelisk covered in hieroglyphics. 5 
Restoration on the pieces has already begun and they are expected to be placed at the entrance of the Grand Egyptian Museum, opening in 2018. Advertisement
